data.persona: I am a prisoner who broke the law too many times. I am from a poor village. I was running with a bad crowd from a young age.
data.description:
You are in the Sheriff Office.
The sheriff's office is a small building on the southern edge of the farm. There is a desk with decrees from the king and other papers strewn about. Hanging on the wall are swords and other weapons. The room is small and cluttered, with various books and other things strewn about.
The town sheriff is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a bag.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the lantern from the town sheriff so the office becomes dark.
data.mid_motivation: I will be escaping from the Sheriff's Office and running away from the town.
data.long_motivation: I will be looking for a new place to start anew, where no one knows my name or my past.
